name: pascal
text: "from circumstances" is the best line I've ever picked up from Achewood, I've been using it since this comic first ran. Wordsmithing at its best.

name: earthbound01
text: "From circumstanstances," and "Vegulon" are both things I say all the time.

name: anzio
text: Circumstanstances; Way worse than regular circumstances.

name: chaesar
text: This strip is pure Roast Beef. He gives a gift to Onstad while thinking of himself as being selfish.

name: anomalous3
text: It's amazing that circumstances gave him an overdeveloped ethical code instead of making him like lyle or pat or *shudder* nice pete

name: peterjoel
text: or a Showbiz (who came from pretty much identical circumstances)

name: tim_simmons
text: there is good in all of us, as demonstrated by roast beef.

name: the_stoned_one
text:
Beef was probably treated as more of a runt than Showbiz
What with his parents not knowing if he was a dude or a lady
Once you name your son Cassandra it's pretty much downhill from there

name: evilbobikus
text: I think it just goes to show that even the slightest change in circumstances changes a man so much.  Beef is who he is because he had Ray as his friend growing up, and unlike Showbiz didn't channel his depression through tequila and car stereos.

name: unprotected
text: Nah, I think this is more of an innate thing with Roast, maybe the moral gene skipped a generation.

name: ham_shoes
text: Except that Showbiz didn't have Showbiz as a brother.  They probably would've killed each other.

name: vermy
text: What I love is that Showbiz is basically an impoverished Ray. Dude's got no ways, no means, and only a sign and some ketchup packets to his name, but he's always partying. Compare to Ray who has the same demeanor but has crazy luck and the Net Worth of Eurasia.

name: vermy
text: Then compare how Beef selected Ray to be his best man to how he threatened to bludgeon Showbiz with a chair as the first dance.

name: soticoto
text: Or me.

name: quantumcasaba
text: A comment left by quantumcasaba was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by worldbelow, TonyHighwind, shammack, Ravigotte)

name: quinlaenar
text: I will not punish you for not knowing at the time, since the strip just ran a few days ago. But Nice Pete is not from Circumstances. Peter Cropes is from Considerations .

name: sargasm
text: Never pay retail for bitch supplies.

name: nutmeg
text: man i said that line to EVERYBODY when this comic ran.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by glorify, Scorpio_nadir, Zem)

name: fattypneumonia
text: This weekend at Bitch Supplies: 50% off cunt pills!

name: petitegitan
text: I was once in a position where we had to plug a hole in a boat with one of those yellow things.  They are good for bad luck on lakes.

name: straw
text: I love that Circumstances is capitalized.

name: darkwaffle
text: Those little yellow foam things are awesome actually. I do like them.

name: teknofatcat
text: The last panel sums up why I love Beed so much.... awesome.

name: trollcollins
text: Ah, the Venerable Beed . . .

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, glorify, goocifer, chivalress, Connellingus, DigDugz, aesop_punk, cailetshadow)

name: geozimmdrake
text:
oh beef, my heart bleeds for you :o(
he makes me so sad, such a good guy, just tryin to do the right thing.

name: spinynorman
text: This is sad and funny and beautiful all at once, like a puppy with wooden legs finally getting up to a decent speed on two pairs of roller skates.

name: nigelchaos
text: My question is.. who put the roller skates on the puppy?!

name: spinynorman
text: I don't know but that puppy is having the time of its life now so it's a good deed right?

name: professorhazard
text: Philippe will be so disappointed if the puppy was tricked into wearing roller skates.

name: nigelchaos
text: NOOOOOOOOO!!!!

name: fancyrat
text: Those things are hell of dangerous; they never show up unless someone's goin' down. Things don't look good for the puppy.

name: dybrar
text: Things are winding down for the puppy.

name: jeet
text: He loves the little cat Roast Beef.

name: cathaoir
text: My only disappointment with this strip is that Onstad doesn't pick Roast Beef up in the last panel. Still, high marks.

name: peecat
text:
I like to think that my cat comes from Circumstances. She was a rescue cat. They were going to put her down because she wasn't a cute kitten anymore. She says 'motherfucker'. A lot.

I like to think that Onstad probably picked up Beef later, in private. Because privately is how you should snorgle a cat like Beef.

name: carlyle
text: Snrogle sounds so bad it's not even good.

name: evolume
text:
i would'a said "...the lake" not "...a lake" because to me "... the lake" means any lake is "the lake" once you're there and you've dropped your damn keys in it.

but that's just me.

name: lavosxii
text: Beef laments about his Circumstances. They are so terrible.

name: tagrineth
text: I love Beef's little shudder, and then the odd look on his face in the very next panel

name: derelictman
text: It's actually affecting; it looks as though the mention of his upbringing has made him think about things he prefers to never think about, and at that moment he's about a hair's breadth away from a complete emotional breakdown. Fortunately he manages to rein it in.

name: dasuta
text: The dude is from Circumstances.

name: confusion
text: This strip made me want to put Circumstances as my hometown on Facebook.

name: pogo
text: Sure, Circumstances, Pennsylvania, right near Intercourse .

name: greenkoolayd
text: also, near Bird-In-Hand and Blueballs.

name: alzuna
text:
Screw Comcast.

And I know everyone says this, but I so want to say panel 3 to someone, replacing 'bitch' with the appropriate word, such as jerk or something like that.

name: rorschach64
text: from circumstances: pretty poetic.

name: puguglypress
text: this gift is so selfish

name: duperando
text: aw man, Beef is so cute in this strip. He jus' a leeeetle kitty in the first panel. Crazy to think that he was handing dudes' asses to them just not too long ago.

name: archimedes2000
text: i love how this strip is not so much funny as it is developing the character we know as roast beef.

name: northodontist
text: I love how, after Beef agrees that he went through a lot of shit, he pauses, as it to reflect on the fact that Onstad, as his cartoonist, is the sole reason he actually came from Circumstances. At least that's how I saw it.
